text: Agar hum isko ajami(non arabic) Quraan bana kar bhejte to yeh log kehte “Kyun na iski aayat khol kar bayan ki gayi? Kya ajeeb baat hai ke kalaam ajami (non-arabic) hai aur mukhatib arabi”.Insey kaho yeh quran imaan laanay walaon ke liye to hidayat aur shifaa hai, magar jo log iman nahin laatey unke liye yeh kaano ki daat (plug / behrapan) aur aankhon ki patti (covering) hai .Unka haal to aisa hai jaise unko door se pukara ja raha ho
